metadata.name: Natpar 100 MCG Injection powder for solution
metadata.composition: 100 MCG Sar9 Met O2 11 Substance P

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in acute respiratory distress syndrome ARDS and viral infection
